metadata.title: CVE-2024-30105 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Denial of Service vulnerability in System.Text.Json deserialization.

criterions.comment: dotnet7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'see notes').
dotnet8 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
